comment.author: 27073477@N00
comment._content:
I think it's André Perchicot. 

Perchicot came in 3rd place in the 1912 Word Cycling Championship, which was held in the Newark Velodrome.

comment.author: 11296846@N00
comment._content: The part in his hair down the middle is definitely from the wind.

comment.author: 8964737@N03
comment._content: He can't smile cos all the flies stuck to his teeth.

comment.author: 9936950@N05
comment._content: Great shot, but it seems too contrasty for the 10s. Maybe the Library did a little Photoshop...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perchicot and the Suter (sp?) brothers [see www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2449487322] look to have been in town to cycle round Madison Square Garden for several days - - not my idea of fun!!! See NYT article query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F03E3DB103CE633A... December 14, 1912, Saturday In a nineteen-minute sprint, which started at 12:58 o'clock this morning, the field of leaders in the six-day race at Madison Square Garden was reduced to five teams.

comment.author: 26142084@N08
comment._content: Great picture, he doesn't look like a cyclist

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: TheeErin and swanq: Thanks for making useful connections! We'll add some information to our description. - Bernie: You may be interested in the information we provide about how we digitized the photographs in the FAQ on our site: http://www.loc.gov/rr/print/flickr_pilot_faq.html#howdigitize

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Uh, no, his hair part has NOTHING to do with the wind.  That is the way men wore their hair.  Look at other old photos.

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Simon, WHAT DOES A CYCLIST LOOK LIKE?????  I am a cyclist.  Do I look like ONE?

comment.author: 11296846@N00
comment._content: The hair part comment was a joke, budderflyman.  "joke" "lighthearted" "butterflies" "fun" "high spirits" "silly"

comment.author: 8964737@N03
comment._content: Hey budderflyman, do the flies stick to the teeth? Is the hair parted down the middle and swept back? That's the cyclist look, very chic on the continent.
